name: miniOS
description:
miniOS is the mini computer operating system that runs in your browser!

inspired by many famous computer operating systems like Windows 7, 10, 98, and XP comes miniOS! a mini computer that runs in your browser!


i'd really really recommend you play this in fullscreen to enhance the immersion 

right now all there is to do is simply click around and discover everything there is

also hold down the mouse on the home screen rearrange the programs like a phone

FYI press escape to go back to the home screen


this is a very early prototype and I'm also gonna start putting more of them for my other projects so I can get them out there to see what you guys think and to get some feedback on them to make my games better and more quality
